pages.text: The $(item)Arid Waste$() has an incredibly hard $(item)Surface Barrier$() that cannot be penetrated by any of the tools you currently posess.$(br2)To make matters worse, the ores you need collect hides under this barrier.$(br2)But do not fret my prehistoric cretin, you can still access these ores.

You can call upon the $(item)Old Gods$() you were $(l:sim_2/3_vein_tapping)acquainted with$() in the last simulation through various rituals, and one particular ritual will be very useful to you in this $(item)simulation$().$(br2)Using this ritual is one of your tasks during this simulation and more instructions can be found $(l:sim_3/4_resources)here$().

pages.title: The Barrier
pages.text: $(item)The Barrier$() is found at world height $(primary)50$(), man is it thicc, just look at it!$(br2)Try and avoid tripping while you are around it, we would like you to keep your few remaining brain cells $(item)intact$().

pages.title: Certus Quartz
pages.text: A valuable and adaptive material, unobtainable through normal means.$(br2)Incredibly hard and can only be mined by $(item)Explosions$().

pages.title: Charged Certus
pages.text: Certus Quartz that has been struck by lightning near the top of the surface barrier.$(br2)Incredibly hard and can only be mined by $(item)Explosions$().
